backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining users, profiles, messages, direct messaging threads, storage integration, and access control with several query and update endpoints.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format by adding direct messaging thread structures and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and foundational styling overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template defining the root element and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/README.md: Project overview documenting features, tech stack, setup instructions, and general usage guidelines.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile initialization flow, and rendering the main application layout.
Wrapper component restricting access to admin-only routes based on admin status and unlock state, with loading and error UI.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing logo, navigation controls, profile access, and a hidden admin unlock dialog using a password. Handles logout, back navigation, and user avatar display.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout managing view stack navigation, sidebar state, and routing between chat, users, profile, admin, DM, and user profile views. Handles admin unlock and conditional rendering of pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPicker.tsx: Provides avatar upload functionality with file validation, progress tracking, and integration with the avatar upload mutation. Displays progress bar and upload button.
frontend/src/components/DirectMessageLis: Renders a list of direct messages with avatars, timestamps, and optional attachments, styled by sender. Determines sender identity and formats relative time.
Message input component supporting text, image attachments, and sending to global or DM channels. Handles upload progress, validation, and Enter-to-send behavior.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Displays global chat messages with avatars, timestamps, and optional deletion via long-press for user's own messages. Differentiates styling based on sender and supports clicking usernames and avatars.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component that collects username, display name, and bio, then saves a new user profile via hook mutations.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation that shows chat, user list, profile, and conditionally an admin panel based on admin state.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user's avatar with fallback initials and optional click handling in different size variants.
frontend/src/components/UserListItem.tsx: Displays a user's avatar, name, presence status, and a button to start messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to II identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hook that checks if the current caller is an admin using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUnlock.ts: Maintains a session-based admin unlock state stored in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDirectMessages.ts: Hooks for fetching DM threads, fetching messages with polling, and sending direct messages with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Hooks for fetching global messages with polling and sending, updating, or deleting messages with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, including display name, bio, avatar, and online status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteLogo.ts: Implements hooks to fetch, cache, and update the site logo using React Query with local caching and image preloading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin UI for uploading the site logo and other images with previews, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/DirectMessagePage.tsx: Displays a direct messaging interface with message fetching, participant profile, scrolling, and message composer.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChatPage.tsx: Renders the global chat feed with message loading, scrolling, and a composer for sending global messages.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows the login screen with site logo and Internet Identity authentication button.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the logged-in user's profile, allowing updates to display name, bio, and avatar with loading and error states handled.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfileViewPage.t: Shows another user's profile with avatar, presence status, bio, and join date, including a back button and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/UsersPage.tsx: Lists all user profiles with search filtering and provides callbacks for selecting a user or clicking their avatar.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Provides image file validation utilities for size and type checks plus filename extension helpers.
frontend/src/utils/siteLogoCache.ts: Manages caching, reading, clearing, and preloading of the site logo URL using localStorage and image preloading.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architecture notes, issues, features, and generated assets for the build system.
